sources.name: IEEE Xplore Digital Library
sources.information_type: Technical papers on ADAS algorithms, sensor processing, and semiconductor architectures
sources.notes: Many recent papers available free; institutional access provides full coverage back to 1988

sources.name: SAE International Digital Library
sources.information_type: Automotive engineering papers, industry technical standards, and OEM case studies
sources.notes: Gold standard for automotive technical content; some papers available free with registration

sources.name: arXiv.org Computer Science
sources.information_type: Cutting-edge research on AI compute, computer vision, and sensor processing algorithms
sources.notes: Pre-print repository; filter by cs.CV, cs.AI, and cs.RO categories for automotive relevance

sources.name: Gartner Research
sources.information_type: Market forecasts, competitive analysis, and technology trend reports
sources.notes: Premium pricing but highest quality market analysis; Magic Quadrants particularly valuable

sources.name: Goldman Sachs Global Investment Research
sources.information_type: Investment research, market forecasts, and company financial analysis
sources.notes: Some reports public; full access requires institutional relationship

sources.name: Strategy Analytics
sources.information_type: Automotive technology market research and forecasting
sources.notes: Specialized in automotive tech; excellent OEM deployment tracking

sources.name: NVIDIA Developer Documentation
sources.information_type: ADAS compute platform specifications, performance benchmarks, and technical whitepapers
sources.notes: Leading ADAS compute platform; detailed technical specifications and case studies

sources.name: Intel Automotive Solutions
sources.information_type: ADAS processor specifications, Mobileye technology, and market insights
sources.notes: Major ADAS chip supplier; Mobileye subsidiary provides camera-focused solutions

sources.name: Qualcomm Snapdragon Digital Chassis
sources.information_type: Automotive compute platform specifications and OEM partnerships
sources.notes: Strong in cellular and AI compute; growing ADAS presence with major OEM wins

sources.name: Continental AG Press & Media
sources.information_type: Tier-1 supplier ADAS deployments, technology roadmaps, and OEM partnerships
sources.notes: Major Tier-1 supplier; excellent source for production deployment timelines

sources.name: Bosch Media Service
sources.information_type: ADAS system integration, semiconductor partnerships, and production announcements
sources.notes: World's largest automotive supplier; strong systems integration perspective

sources.name: SAE International Standards Store
sources.information_type: ADAS technical standards, testing procedures, and safety requirements
sources.notes: Official automotive standards body; J3016 defines automation levels industry-wide

sources.name: ISO Standards Catalogue
sources.information_type: International safety standards for automotive systems and semiconductors
sources.notes: Global safety standards; ISO 26262 is critical for ADAS semiconductor design

sources.name: NHTSA Federal Register
sources.information_type: US federal ADAS regulations and safety requirements
sources.notes: Official US regulatory source; impacts all vehicles sold in US market

recommended_search_strategy: 1) Start with free sources (arXiv, NVIDIA, Intel, OEM press releases) for current technology trends. 2) Use IEEE and SAE for peer-reviewed technical specifications. 3) Access Gartner/Strategy Analytics for market sizing (most valuable ROI for subscription cost). 4) Monitor Tier-1 supplier press releases for deployment timelines. 5) Cross-reference findings across categories to validate market estimates. 6) Set up Google Alerts for key terms from major industry sources. 7) Use standards bodies to understand regulatory requirements driving adoption.
confidence_rationale: This source collection covers all major categories with multiple high-credibility options per category. The mix includes both forward-looking research (academic) and current market reality (industry/financial). Standards sources ensure regulatory compliance context. The combination of free and subscription sources provides both accessible starting points and premium analysis depth.
